choices.text: Sure, what's up?

sure.text: I don't think this is working out between us.

choices.text: What do you mean? Is there something I did wrong?
Can we talk about this? I don't want to lose you.
I don't understand why you're doing this. We had so many good times together.

what_do_you_mean.text: It's not anything you did, it's just that I don't feel the same way about you as I used to. I think it's time for us to go our separate ways.

choices.text: I understand. I'll miss you, but if that's how you feel, I can't change it.

i_understand.text: Thank you for understanding. I hope we can still be friends.

choices.text: I don't think I can be just friends with you.
Maybe we should take a break from each other for a while.

i_dont_think.text: I understand. Take all the time you need.
